articles.title: Prescription patrol: New AI spots dangerous drug combos before they harm you - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: A new AI model identifies drugs that shouldn’t be taken together. Using a machine-learning algorithm, researchers can predict interactions that could interfere with a drug’s effectiveness
articles.content:
Doxycycline and warfarin: A big no
They used this program to analyze 28 existing drugs and 1,595 experimental ones, making almost 2 million predictions of possible drug interactions.
